#summary How to add a dependency in your maven project in order to use GData Api.
#labels Phase-Deploy,Featured

== Add mandubian-mvn repository to your pom.xml repositories=
{{{
<repository>
  <id>mandubian-mvn</id>
  <url>http://mandubian-mvn.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/mandubian-mvn/repo/{version}</url>
</repository>
}}}

_{version} should be replaced by a version number.
For example:_
{{{
http://mandubian-mvn.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/mandubian-mvn/repo/1.36.0
}}}


== Add dependencies to your pom.xml dependencies=
{{{
<dependency>
  <groupId>com.google.gdata</groupId>
  <artifactId>gdata-core</artifactId>
  <version>1.0</version>
</dependency>
}}}
